title: A File On A Laptop
content:

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:extra-black-highlighter-theme]]

----

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=https://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/frownspc3/allthingsmustbegin.png|align=center|width=700px|caption=All Waves Must Bend]]

----

**Selachian PugnƒÅtorial Capabilities:** It is imperative of Oracle to successfully ascertain the selachian combat abilities of SPC-001.

**Project Components:** To know the nature of SPC-001 is to know the nature of the Centre.

For more information, see //Document 001-GOF.01-Operatus//.

**Addendum 001.1:** Attached Documentation

[[collapsible show="Enter Super Secret Code" hide="Revealing Secrets..."]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[=]]
[[div style="display: inline-block; border: dashed 1px #444444; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 380px; padding: 10px;"]]

The first pugilist sat down
on the cold stone of
the ocean floor, where
his eyes met his foe.

The shark wriggled through
the water like a maggot.
Its influence spread on a
seemingly-unstoppable
march of horror.

"You're gross," the pugilist claimed.
His foe was silent,
content to stare at him
in a deafening silence.

The pugilist sighed
and readied his fists.
He had to be prepared
for what was to come.

After all, he was a pugilist.
He was the answer.
@@@@
@@@@
-- - --
@@@@
@@@@
[[div style="display: inline-block; border: solid 1px #000000; background-color: #F5F5F5; width: 300px;"]]
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/misterfrown-s-dumbest-proposal/offset/1 Access Document 001-GOF.01-Operatus]
[[/div]]

[[/=]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {

    --logo-image: url("http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:shark-punching-centre-bhl/spc-header.png");
    --header-title: "Shark Punching Centre";
    --header-subtitle: "Search, Punch, Conquer";
 

    /* ===THEME COLORS=== */
    /* subdued theme color, for visited links */
    --pale-accent: 20, 20, 210;
    /* vivid theme color, the "default" accent color */
    --bright-accent: 0, 71, 194;
    /* theme color */
    --medium-accent: 40, 91, 122;
    /* darker theme color */
    --dark-accent: 0, 42, 115;
    /* alternate accent color, for newpage links */
    --alt-accent: 190, 190, 255;
 
    --modal-header-bg: 150, 191, 255;
 
}

#page-content .anom-bar-container.high .text-part .disrupt-class::before {
content: "5" !important;
}

#page-content .anom-bar-container.humble .text-part .risk-class::before {
content: "1" !important;
}

[[/module]]
author: MisterFrown
